nodes.name: JavaScript Event Loop
nodes.description: Call stack, task queue, microtask queue, macrotasks, how async JS executes
challenge_hooks: What is the order of execution: setTimeout(0), Promise.resolve(), sync code?
Why does a long-running sync task block the UI?
What's the difference between microtasks and macrotasks?

nodes.name: Closures & Scope
nodes.description: Lexical scope, closure capture, common pitfalls (loop closures), module pattern
challenge_hooks: Why does `var i` in a for loop create the classic closure bug? How does `let` fix it?
Implement a memoize function using closures.
What is a closure and when is it garbage collected?

nodes.name: Promises & Async/Await
nodes.description: Promise states, chaining, error handling, async/await, concurrent patterns (Promise.all)
challenge_hooks: What happens if you don't catch a rejected Promise?
What's the difference between Promise.all and Promise.allSettled?
Can you use await outside an async function?

nodes.name: DOM & Rendering
nodes.description: DOM tree, reflow vs repaint, virtual DOM, layout thrashing, requestAnimationFrame
challenge_hooks: What triggers a reflow vs a repaint?
Why does reading offsetHeight after writing style cause layout thrashing?
How does a virtual DOM reduce actual DOM operations?

nodes.name: CSS Specificity & Cascade
nodes.description: Specificity calculation, cascade order, inheritance, custom properties, BEM
challenge_hooks: Calculate the specificity of: `#nav .link:hover`. Which wins over `a.active`?
What's the difference between `inherit`, `initial`, and `unset`?
Why do CSS custom properties cascade differently than regular properties?

nodes.name: Web Performance & Core Vitals
nodes.description: LCP, CLS, INP, critical rendering path, code splitting, lazy loading
challenge_hooks: What does Largest Contentful Paint measure and what commonly causes a poor score?
How does code splitting improve Time to Interactive?
What causes Cumulative Layout Shift?

nodes.name: Accessibility (a11y)
nodes.description: WCAG, ARIA roles, keyboard navigation, focus management, screen readers
challenge_hooks: When should you use role='button' on a div vs an actual <button>?
What does aria-live do and when would you use it?
How do you manage focus when a modal opens and closes?

nodes.name: HTTP & Browser Networking
nodes.description: HTTP/1.1 vs HTTP/2, caching headers, CORS, cookies, service workers
challenge_hooks: What is CORS and why does the browser enforce it but curl doesn't?
Explain Cache-Control: max-age vs ETag-based validation.
How does a service worker enable offline-first apps?

nodes.name: Prototypal Inheritance
nodes.description: Prototype chain, Object.create, class syntax desugaring, this binding
challenge_hooks: What does `new` actually do step by step?
Why can arrow functions not be used as constructors?
Explain the difference between Object.create(null) and {}.

nodes.name: Frontend State Management
nodes.description: Component state, lifting state, flux pattern, derived state, immutability
challenge_hooks: Why does mutating state directly in React fail to trigger a re-render?
When would you choose global state over component-local state?
What is derived state and why should you avoid storing it redundantly?
